member.name: M:AzureServicesAPI.Controllers.StorageAccountContainerController.ListContainers(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{AzureServicesAPI.Controllers.StorageAccountContainerController},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: List all the container in the storage account, no exception handling since this is a sample
member.param: Shared access signature Token which can be generated from Azure under Storage Account -> Container -> Shared access signature
member.returns: Json Object with some basic information about the container

member.name: M:AzureServicesAPI.Controllers.StorageAccountContainerController.ListContainersAndContents(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{AzureServicesAPI.Controllers.StorageAccountContainerController},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: List all the container and its contents in the storage account, no exception handling since this is a sample
member.param: Shared access signature Token which can be generated from Azure under Storage Account -> Container -> Shared access signature
member.returns: Json Object with some basic information about the container and its contents

member.name: M:AzureServicesAPI.Controllers.StorageAccountContainerController.CreateContainer(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{AzureServicesAPI.Controllers.StorageAccountContainerController},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Shared access signature Token which can be generated from Azure under Storage Account -> Container -> Shared access signature
Name of the container to create
member.returns: Json Object with some basic information about the container and its contents
